intro: Hieracium ischnoadenum, commonly known as the slender hawkweed, is a species of flowering plant in the family Asteraceae. It is native to southern Africa, particularly South Africa, where it grows in grasslands and open habitats. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, yellowish flowers arranged in a composite head. Its leaves are narrow and slightly hairy, and it typically reaches a height of about 30 to 60 centimeters. Hieracium ischnoadenum is often found in disturbed soils and is adapted to thrive in arid or semi-arid conditions.
